name: Artsy
author: keegnotrub

sections.description:
An update on the incredible Art Direction plugin by Noël Jackson (http://noel.io) and Dave Rupert (http://daverupert.com). Allows you to enter custom CSS to be applied per post/page.

Additional features include:

  • Optionally place span classes on your post/page title characters
  • Optionally place span classes on your post/page title words
  • Ability to responsivley use viewport units on post/page title
sections.installation:
1. Upload artsy folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Use the Artsy Styles editor under the post/page entry text to enter custom CSS per post/page

short_description: Art Direction for WordPress - Allows you to enter custom CSS to be applied per post/page.
